MefItemTerm.description: The terms of the Quote Item. Used to describe a term (also known as commitment) for a Quote Item. Each Quote Item in a Quote Request could have a different Requested Quote Item Term. The Buyer specifies the longest term that they would accept. The Buyer may be willing to accept a shorter term. If the Seller responds with a term longer than the Buyerâ€™s request, it is treated as an alternate response.
